descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Daedric Sisters Standalone Followers[/size]

[size=2]I want to make their simple quest. Anyone help me?
[/size]
[/font][b][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=4]English and Japanese descripiton[/size][/color][/font][/b]


[color=#e06666][size=4]Tell me if you find some problems.[/size][/color]
I'm not bad English and good at Japanese.

問題その他何かあればご連絡下さい。

[font=Arial][color=#ead1dc][size=4][Introduction][/size][/color][/font]
Do you know the three sisters in Skyrim? I've heard that they are dremoras, but they aren't warlike.　In addition, they are awe-inspiringly beautiful.
Did They make you curious?If you have no fear of death, why don't you see them bravely?

ある三姉妹の話を聞いたことはありますか？どうやら彼女達はドレモラなのにあまり好戦的ではないようです。しかも、気高く美しいと聞いています。
彼女達の事が気になりますか？死を恐れぬ勇気があなたにあるのなら、会いに行ってみてはどうでしょう？


[color=#ead1dc][size=4][What's This Mod?][/size][/color]
This mod Adds STANDALONE FOLLOWERS Ella, Fio and Isolde to the castle of cerendipity that this mod also adds.

ドレモラの三姉妹、エラ、フィオ、イゾルデを、このModによって追加された城「The Castle of Cerendipity」に追加します。


[color=#ead1dc][size=4][About Them][/size][/color]
They do magics of different elements.Only Fio fights with not only magics but also an one-handed sword.

彼女達はそれぞれ属性の違う魔法を扱いますが、フィオだけは片手剣も使って戦います。

And Ella can use the restoration perhaps.
[b]
もしかしたらエラは回復魔法を使ってくれるかも？[/b][b][color=#ffe599]
[/color]
[/b][color=#ff00ff][size=6]Bodytype:UNPB-BBP[/size][/color]
(There is a version that body type depends on one you installed. If you use CBBE for your player character, Sisters use the same.)
[color=#444444][size=1]おっぱいぷるんぷるん　Σ(ﾟДﾟ；)ｪｪ！？[/size]
[/color]インストールされている体型に依存するタイプも用意しました！

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][Recommended Mods][/size][/color]
Any of Follower overhaul mods like FLP(I use FLP)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][Credits][/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by tktk 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot 
[color=#6d9eeb]Morten Hair pack [/color](converted by  mortenhoward)
[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/eiries-and-honeyvanity/]Abyssal Dremora Texture[/url] by Eiries and Honeyvanity[size=2]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female[/url] by [b]asianboy345[/b]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37673/?]Skyrim Scarves and Mufflers[/url]　by [b]cmdo
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99 [size=2]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] by [b]Blessed Redux Project team[/b]
[/size]

Thanks to anyone I forgot to mention here.[/b]
 
[/size]I'm looking foward to your uploading [b]screen[/b] [b]shots[/b] that they are in them.
ＳＳ大募集！
author: zahaku
